metaData.title: The Flipped Triangle
metaData.generalDescription: We’ve already learned how to use nested for loops to create interesting results. In this challenge you will use nested for loops to create a flipped triangle.

stepData.preText: First let’s make a grid of ellipses. We know how to easily do this with two for loops.
stepData.postText: In this example, the grid gets lighter at it goes down.Can you change it to be lighter as it goes across?

stepData.preText: Now let’s turn our grid into a triangle.
stepData.postText: Can you flip the triangle to make it look like this?
